name: Don't Crash (itch) (Matroix)
description:
Don't Crash is  a game where you have to avoid crashing the formula because its expensive. Please don't crash it.

"I'll put a F as your final grade"" - My art teacher of all things.

"The cars in this game are very aerodynamic"" - Some random person.

"Very cool Matroix, very cool" - The Trumpster.
